com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class File

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.File
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public class File
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements Component
    A Component for working with files and directories on the device.

    • Method Detail

      • SaveFile

        public void SaveFile(java.lang.String text,
                     java.lang.String fileName)
        Stores the text to a specified file on the phone. Calls the Write function to write to the file asynchronously to prevent the UI from hanging when there is a large write.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be stored
        fileName - the file to which the text will be stored

      • AppendToFile

        public void AppendToFile(java.lang.String text,
                         java.lang.String fileName)
        Appends text to a specified file on the phone. Calls the Write function to write to the file asynchronously to prevent the UI from hanging when there is a large write.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be stored
        fileName - the file to which the text will be stored

      • ReadFrom

        public void ReadFrom(java.lang.String fileName)
        Retrieve the text stored in a specified file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file from which the text is read
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file cannot be found
        java.io.IOException - if the text cannot be read from the file

      • Delete

        public void Delete(java.lang.String fileName)
        Delete the specified file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file to be deleted

      • Write

        private void Write(java.lang.String filename,
                   java.lang.String text,
                   boolean append)
        Writes to the specified file.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file to write
        text - to write to the file
        append - determines whether text should be appended to the file, or overwrite the file

      • normalizeNewLines

        private java.lang.String normalizeNewLines(java.lang.String s)
        Replace Windows-style CRLF with Unix LF as String. This allows end-user to treat Windows text files same as Unix or Mac. In future, allowing user to choose to normalize new lines might also be nice - in case someone really wants to detect Windows-style line separators, or save a file which was read (and expect no changes in size or checksum).
        Parameters:
        string - to convert

      • AsyncRead

        private void AsyncRead(java.io.InputStream fileInput,
                       java.lang.String fileName)
        Asynchronously reads from the given file. Calls the main event thread when the function has completed reading from the file.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the file to read
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException - when the system cannot read the file

      • GotText

        public void GotText(java.lang.String text)
        Event indicating that a request has finished.
        Parameters:
        text - read from the file

      • AfterFileSaved

        public void AfterFileSaved(java.lang.String fileName)
        Event indicating that a request has finished.
        Parameters:
        text - write to the file

      • AbsoluteFileName

        private java.lang.String AbsoluteFileName(java.lang.String filename)
        Returns absolute file path.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file used to construct the file path
